name: The Prospector
description:
Instructions:

Move the diamond to the exit.

Controls:
  • Walk: A&D / Arrow keys
  • Jump: Space bar
  • Pick up items: F
  • Use spoon: E
  • Pause menu: ESC
How to start playing 1. Launch the game

Launch the game on itch.io under The" class="redactor-linkify-object">The" class="redactor-linkify-object">https://hakon19.itch.io/the-prospector">The Prospector link.

2. Create an account

You can either create a new account or play as a guest. We recommend you to create an account so that your progress gets saved the next time you play. All your information is stored on an external server so don't be afraid of clearing your cookies!

If you play as a guest your records will not be stored and not counted to the highscores!

If you are here just to take a look at the levels, you are welcome to log in with demo account which has all levels unlocked.

The demo credentials are (SPOLIER ALERT):

  • Username: demouser
  • Password: demouser
3. Login

Log in with your new account and start playing! We recommend trying to solve the levels in the order that they come. The first level in the order is a tutorial. You can revisit the tutorial via the help menu and you can also play around in the sandbox available in the same menu.

Credits SFX:
